GeochemXYDiagram.name: Basalt Control Diagram (Total Fe)
GeochemXYDiagram.Comment: Pearce Element Ratio diagram for basalt composition using Ti as a conserved element denominator. Diagram calculation uses total Fe.
Basalt control line, with a slope of 1, describes fractionation and/or sorting of minerals forming the composition of basalt.
GeochemXYDiagram.Reference: Theoretical basis for PER diagrams is described in Stanley C. R., and Madeisky H. E., 1996 Lithogeochemical Exploration for Metasomatic Zones Associated with Hydrothermal Mineral Deposits Using Pearce Element Ratio Analysis
